definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Fine texture, uniform color-make-up to show you natural luster, and the makeup is not easily come off.
sentences.chinese: 質地細緻，上色均勻，不易脫妝，妝效呈現自然光澤。

sentences.english: Velour provides extra softness and size.
sentences.chinese: 絲絨質地更加柔軟，尺寸也更大。

sentences.english: Contain long-lasting formula, which is wild and easy to apply color.
sentences.chinese: 蘊含持久配方，質地溫和易上色。

sentences.english: Dual-layer liquid formula has shinning watery texture.
sentences.chinese: 雙層液體配方，明亮水珠質地。

sentences.english: Lightweight and non-greasy, it absorbs quickly into skin.
sentences.chinese: 質地輕盈，不油膩，吸收迅速。

sentences.english: Bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product.
sentences.chinese: 煙煤一般被視作一種質地均勻一致的產品。

sentences.english: Many of the deposits are too small, too impure .
sentences.chinese: 許多蘊藏量太小，質地太不純。

sentences.english: The killing rate is usually affected by the quality of the material.
sentences.chinese: 不同質地的原料對殺菌率有不同影響。

sentences.english: Early stoves were ceramic, and then porcelain was mostly.
sentences.chinese: 質地上早期多陶質，後來多爲瓷質。

sentences.english: Everyone in the trade knows that US’s bristles are of superior quality to those from other countries.
sentences.chinese: 同行中人人皆知美國豬鬃質地優於其他國家的供貨。

sentences.english: The texture is of medium harshness , not silky or wiry. Wavy or curly hair is a fault.
sentences.chinese: 毛髮質地爲中等粗硬，不應該呈絲狀或剛毛狀。

sentences.english: On a touch screen, your fingers are pressing on a hard glass or plastic surface.
sentences.chinese: 觸屏的觸摸表面是硬玻璃或者塑料質地的。

sentences.english: He bought two high quality inkstones.
sentences.chinese: 他買了兩方質地優良的端硯。

sentences.english: With the refreshing and mild quality, it is especially suitable to the people with sensitive eye skin or wearing the contact lenses.
sentences.chinese: 質地清爽溫和，尤其適合配帶隱形眼鏡人士使用。

sentences.english: Ebony hard because of detailed, color-rich eye.
sentences.chinese: 由於烏木質地堅硬細密，色澤豐富悅目。

texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
